Jan Algermissen wrote:
>
> Apologies for last night's empty message - wrong recipient :-)
> 

Thanks for clarifying, I just figured it was Yahoo's fault.  Anyone
else notice how we've gone from posting instantaneously last week, to
having messages bounce, to now a 2-3 hour delay before posts show up,
leading to double-posting?  The only apologizing necessary is from
yahoogroups...

"Well, I don't think there is any question about it. It can only be
attributable to human error.  This sort of thing has cropped up before,
and it has always been due to human error."  -HAL 9000

...although I'm sure they'll blame it on hardware failure!  ;-)

-Eric
